summary: Gold Reflexivity Tripwire approved and activated. Detects anticipatory liquidity-pivot buying in precious metals; feeds Vol/Liq and Credit domains; tightens TTL 10–15% when active.
Cross-Reflexivity Bridge approved. Tracks AI↔Crypto↔Commodity capital rotations; feeds Vol/Liq (+0.3) and Credit (+0.2); TTL −5% default; integrates within Reflexivity Family.
Market Breadth & Liquidity Monitor approved. Consolidates ETF flow, breadth, and VIX-term data into MSI inputs; supersedes prior Breadth & Liquidity Dry-Run feed.
Unified Portfolio System Map upgraded to UPSM_vNext (Post-October Convex Cycle #4). Architecture coherence verified; Reflexivity Suite activated.
